ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
just a question about defense and offense .
First of all, i am an erudine wizzard level 12 .Yesterday i talked with a
wizzard level 13 and i was surprised when he tells me that his ac was ...
211 . He is an half elf, so i agree they have more agility then us. But i
already make some test and it seems that +8 in agility only give 1 in ac (i
tried with two rings +4 agility). Our dex are the same and for the armor he
only get 5 ac more then me. My current armor class (without any spel) is
177. Not bad, not good i agree :). So i come to the fact : what is the
maximum defense skill for a wizzard ??? Can you gain offense (and defense)
skill vs green creatures ? I know of a rules telling that a wizzard can have
3+ (level *3) in his attack skill (piercing for example) but i know that i
am at 48 at defense so this rule dones't seem to apply for offense and
defense (only for piercing blunt ect). So someone can tell me more about
this rule or about ac in general (for wizzard?). And last question any good
idea where i can find good armor for a wizzard ? (actually the best armor i
get is bear boot 5ac).

Thank you all


yakos
level 12 wizzad
